text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi A real sign of true friendship between 🇮🇳 INDIA and 🇺🇸 USA, we people of india pray for Americans life to save from COVID19 pendemic. Two countries carries for each other a unbreakable trust and remarkable understanding to write a new era of indo-US friendship. @POTUS
